statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_tokens=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.token_usage.current // 0'); weekly_used=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.token_usage.weekly_used // 0'); weekly_limit=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.token_usage.weekly_limit // 200000'); weekly_percent=$(awk "BEGIN {printf \"%.1f\", ($weekly_used / $weekly_limit) * 100}"); current_fmt=$([ $current_tokens -ge 1000 ] && awk "BEGIN {printf \"%.1fK\", $current_tokens / 1000}" || echo $current_tokens); weekly_fmt=$([ $weekly_used -ge 1000 ] && awk "BEGIN {printf \"%.1fK\", $weekly_used / 1000}" || echo $weekly_used); limit_fmt=$([ $weekly_limit -ge 1000 ] && awk "BEGIN {printf \"%.1fK\", $weekly_limit / 1000}" || echo $weekly_limit); dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir // .cwd'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name // .model.id'); style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name // "default"'); branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo ''); time=$(date "+%H:%M:%S"); printf "\033[2m%s\033[0m %s%s | %s | tokens: %s/%s (\033[2m%s%% weekly\033[0m) | %s" "$time" "$(basename \"$dir\")" "$([ -n \"$branch\" ] && echo \" [$branch]\" || echo \"\")" "$model" "$current_fmt" "$limit_fmt" "$weekly_percent" "$style"
